    • subNPlayers

      public void subNPlayers()

    • setNPlayers

      public void setNPlayers​(int nPlayers)

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(Player p, int socketId)
      Adds a new player to the list and notifies the observer. calls init() once 3 players are connected.
      Returns:
      true if a player is added, false if player name already exists in actual game

    • init

      public void init()
      Orders the playerList and sets turnOf. Sends playerList to the clients Checks if there is a saved game with same players of actual game

    • addWorker

      public boolean addWorker​(Player p, int x, int y, int socketId) throws java.io.IOException
      Adds a worker in board
      Returns:
      TRUE if the worker is added inside the game board
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard​(Message mex)
      Method that print the board
      Parameters:
      mex - mex sent to client

    • setGods

      public boolean setGods​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> gods, int socketId)
      Sets the 3 allowed gods to allowedGods list. Broadcast list to all players if it works.
      Returns:
      true if gods are set, false if fails

    • addGod

      public void addGod​(java.lang.String god, Player player, int socketId)
      Sets god chosen by a player and remove god from allowedGods list

    • passTurn

      public void passTurn() throws java.io.IOException
      Method that ends the turn of the current player and saves the game
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn() throws java.io.IOException
      Method that calls passTurn() and checkStuckPlayer() if a player can end his turn
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if game can't be saved

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(Player p, int xStart, int yStart, int xDest, int yDest, int socketId)
      Method that invokes Board.move() and according to results sends different messages to clients

    • build

      public void build​(Player p, int xStart, int yStart, int xDest, int yDest, int level, int socketId)
      Method that invokes Board.build() and according to results sends different messages to clients

    • checkStuckPlayer

      public void checkStuckPlayer​(Player p) throws java.io.IOException
      checks if a player has both the workers stucked if true, removes the player from game and his workers from board
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

      java.io.IOException

    • playersName

      public java.lang.String playersName()
      Returns:
      all players name in this format name1-name2-name3-

    • checkNames

      public boolean checkNames​(java.lang.String[] names)
      Checks if actual game players are the same of the saved games
      Returns:
      true if there are a game with same players, else false

    • fixGods

      public void fixGods​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> plNew)
